content:
We submitted an issue -TOFSUP-356 Trifolia is inserting an empty array which is causing issues with the FHIR validator. The resolution was that - The issue is fixed. Once the DEV environment is updated, you can use the functionality in the DEV environment until it is released into production.
Can you please provide some guidance on how we can point the Dev version of Trifolia to our current IG so that we can export a new version that addresses the empty array issue?

You just need to make sure the app is pointing to the correct database/server: image.png
Your IG will be there.
That's up in the right hand corner of the screen. Just change it to whatever server you are using for your IG.
And the link is https://trifolia-fhir-dev.lantanagroup.com/ if you don't have it.
